trans-unit.source: found_users_query – Alters SQL ‘SELECT FOUND_ROWS()’ clause to the query that returns the count total.
{custom_post_type} – Custom Post Type names must be all in lower-case and without any spaces.
Action Hook: Fires after a plugin has been activated.

Display all users except a specific list of users

Display users based on a keyword search

Display users sorted by registered, Ascending order

trans-unit.source: Find users that registered during the last 12 hours:
NOTE: Use get_the_author_meta() if you need to return (and do something with) the field, rather than just display it.
Note 1: The “create_posts” capability correspond to “edit_books” so it become equal to “edit_posts”.
Note 2: See capabilities note 2 about meta capabilities mapping for custom post type.

Note 2: with ‘LIKE’ the value parameter is change to ‘%<value>%’. So the string is searched anywhere in the custom field value. If value parameter contain a ‘%’ it is escaped. So it bans to search a string beginning by some characters, for exemple… To construct this query you must use ‘REGEXP’ with a regular expression in value parameter (ex : ‘^n.*’ matchs all values that beginning by “n” or “N”).
Note 3: If you use capabilities parameter, capability_type complete your capabilities.

Note: This class’s access is marked as private. That means it is not intended for use by plugin and theme developers as it is subject to change without warning in any future WordPress release. If you would still like to make use of the class, you should make a copy to use and distribute with your own project, or else use it at your own risk.
Note: Defaults to the categories meta box (

Note: Hierarchical taxonomies will have a list with checkboxes to select an existing category in the taxonomy admin box on the post edit page (like default post categories). Non-hierarchical taxonomies will just have an empty text field to type-in taxonomy terms to associate with the post (like default post tags).
Note: If query_var is empty, null, or a boolean FALSE, WordPress will still attempt to interpret it (4.2.2) and previews/views of your custom post will return 404s.

Note: If registering a post type inside of a plugin, call flush_rewrite_rules() in your activation and deactivation hook (see Flushing Rewrite on Activation below). If flush_rewrite_rules() is not used, then you will have to manually go to Settings > Permalinks and refresh your permalink structure before your custom post type will show the correct structure.
Note: If set it to false then standard admin role can’t edit the posts types. Then the edit_post capability must be added to all roles to add or edit the posts types.

trans-unit.target: 注意：如果当前帖子是附件，例如

trans-unit.source: Note: If you want to show the posts’s list that are associated to taxonomy’s terms, you must set exclude_from_search to false (ie : for call site_domaine/?taxonomy_slug=term_slug or site_domaine/taxonomy_slug/term_slug). If you set to true, on the taxonomy page (ex: taxonomy.php) WordPress will not find your posts and/or pagination will make 404 error…
Note: In 3.4, this argument is effectively replaced by the
Note: The queries affected include the following (also initiated when rewrites are handled)

Note: The query_var is used for direct queries through WP_Query like new WP_Query(array('people'=>$person_name)) and URL queries like /?people=$person_name. Setting query_var to false will disable these methods, but you can still fetch posts with an explicit WP_Query taxonomy query like WP_Query(array('taxonomy'=>'people', 'term'=>$person_name)).

Note: The query_var parameter has no effect if the ‘publicly_queryable’ parameter is set to false. query_var adds the custom post type’s query var to the built-in query_vars array so that WordPress will recognize it. WordPress removes any query var not included in that array.

Note: This same method is called whenever permalink settings are changed or saved in the WordPress admin, so rewrite rules can be manually refreshed by visiting the Settings > Permalinks screen in WordPress’s admin.
Note: When you use custom post type that use thumbnails remember to check that the theme also supports thumbnails or use add_theme_support function.

Note: You may need to flush the rewrite rules after changing this. You can do it manually by going to the Permalink Settings page and re-saving the rules — you don’t need to change them — or by calling

Note: this parameter was intended for Pages. Be careful when choosing it for your custom post type – if you are planning to have very many entries (say – over 2-3 thousand), you will run into load time issues. With this parameter set to
Note: those last four primitive capabilities are checked in core in various locations.

Note: It’s also possible to see all node ID’s with the example from get_nodes().
Note: This function outputs the complete shortlink for the post, to return the shortlink use wp_get_shortlink().
Please note: The value portion of the data parameter’s column=>value pairs must be scalar. If you pass an array (or object) as a value to be inserted you will generate a warning.

Required. This property must be an associative array with two keys: 'parent' and 'id'. The value of each key should be the names of the object properties that hold the

trans-unit.source: WARNING: If this function is called without a parameter or with a parameter of
Warning: This is not the same as get_bloginfo( 'url' ) (which will return the homepage url), but as get_bloginfo( 'wpurl' ).

trans-unit.source: You MUST register any options used by this function with register_setting() or they won’t be saved and updated automatically.

do not need to be manually enqueued using wp_enqueue_script() if they are listed as a dependency of another script that is enqueued. WordPress will automatically include the registered script before it includes the enqueued script that lists the registered script’s handle as a dependency.
trans-unit.target: 不需要使用手动排队wp_enqueue_script（）（如果它们被列为入队的另一个脚本的依赖项）。WordPress将自动包括已注册的脚本，然后再包含将已注册脚本的句柄作为依赖项列出的入队脚本。

trans-unit.source: filter_function_name should be unique function name. It cannot match any other function name already declared.
trans-unit.target: filter_function_name应该是唯一的函数名称。它不能与已经声明的任何其他函数名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: per_page – the number of items to show per page
total_items – the total number of items to be displayed. Usually as simple as
total_pages – the total number of pages. Can be left blank or calculated manually, like so:
$args can be passed to set flags on the setting, similar to register_meta().
trans-unit.target: $args 可以传递$ args来设置设置上的标志，类似于 register_meta() 。

trans-unit.source: $args can now also be an object.
trans-unit.target: $args 现在也可以是一个对象。

trans-unit.source: $classes is a space-separated string of class names instead of an array.
trans-unit.target: $classes 是用空格分隔的类名称字符串，而不是数组。

trans-unit.source: $default is now returned early when the setting post value is invalid.
trans-unit.target: $default 现在，当设置后的值无效时，将早返回$ default。

trans-unit.source: $format should be a PHP date format string. ‘U’ and ‘G’ formats will return a sum of timestamp with timezone offset. $date is expected to be local time in MySQL format (Y-m-d H:i:s).
$identifier should be a unique identifier for the test that should run. Plugins and themes are encouraged to prefix test identifiers with their slug to avoid any collisions between tests.
trans-unit.target: $identifier 应该是应该运行的测试的唯一标识符。鼓励插件和主题在测试标识符前加上标签，以免测试之间发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: $l10n is the data itself. The data can be either a single- or multi- (as of 3.3) dimensional array. Like
$new_whitelist_options was renamed to $new_allowed_options. Please consider writing more inclusive code.

$object_name is the name of the variable which will contain the data. Note that this should be unique to both the script and to the plugin or theme. Thus, the value here should be properly prefixed with the slug or another unique value, to prevent conflicts. However, as this is a JavaScript object name, it cannot contain dashes. Use underscores or camelCasing.
$parent: Category ID of the parent category.
$post can be a post ID or WP_Post object.
trans-unit.target: $post 可以是帖子ID或WP_Post对象。

trans-unit.source: $prepared_comment can now be a WP_Error to short-circuit insertion.
$prepared_comment can now be a WP_Error to shortcircuit insertion.
trans-unit.target: $prepared_comment 现在可以是一个WP_Error来插入短路。

trans-unit.source: $sanitize_callback was deprecated. The callback from register_setting() is now used instead.
trans-unit.target: $sanitize_callback 已弃用。现在改用 register_setting() 中的回调。

trans-unit.source: $taxonomy is optional if $field is 'term_taxonomy_id'. Converted to return a WP_Term object if $output is OBJECT.
trans-unit.target: $taxonomy 如果 $field 为'term_taxonomy_id'，则$ taxonomy是可选的。如果 $output 为 OBJECT ,则转换为返回WP_Term对象。

trans-unit.source: $translations was added as a possible argument to $hook_extra.
trans-unit.target: $translations 被添加为 $hook_extra 的可能参数。

trans-unit.source: $uri can be an array of URIs.

trans-unit.target: $username 现在接受一个电子邮件地址。
'admin_email' -博客管理员的电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: 'blog_charset' – Character encoding for your blog; set in Reading Options.
trans-unit.target: 'blog_charset' -您博客的字符编码；在阅读选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'blogdescription' – Tagline for your blog; set in General Options.
trans-unit.target: 'blogdescription' -您博客的标语；在常规选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'blogname' – Weblog title; set in General Options.
trans-unit.target: 'blogname' –博客标题；在常规选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'date_format' – Default date format; set in General Options.
trans-unit.target: 'date_format' –默认日期格式；在常规选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'default_category' – Default post category; set in Writing Options.
trans-unit.target: 'default_category' –默认帖子类别；在“书写选项”中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'home' – The blog’s home web address; set in General Options.
trans-unit.target: 'home' –博客的家庭网址；在常规选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'internal-name' => array( 'orderby', 'asc' ) – The second element sets the initial sorting order.
'internal-name' => array( 'orderby', true ) – The second element makes the initial order descending.
'posts_per_page' – Maximum number of posts to show on a page; set in Reading Options.
trans-unit.target: 'posts_per_page' -在页面上显示的最大帖子数；在阅读选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'posts_per_rss' – Maximum number of most recent posts to show in the syndication feed; set in Reading Options.
trans-unit.target: 'posts_per_rss' –在联合供稿中显示的最新帖子的最大数量；在阅读选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'siteurl' – WordPress web address; set in General Options.
trans-unit.target: 'siteurl' – WordPress网站地址；在常规选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'start_of_week' – Day of week calendar should start on; set in General Options.
trans-unit.target: 'start_of_week' –星期几应该从日历开始；在常规选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'template' – The current theme’s name; set in Presentation.
trans-unit.target: 'template' –当前主题的名称；在演示文稿中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'upload_path' – Default upload location; set in Miscellaneous Options.
trans-unit.target: 'upload_path' –默认上传位置；在其他选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: 'users_can_register' – Whether users can register; set in General Options.
trans-unit.target: 'users_can_register' –用户是否可以注册；在常规选项中设置。

trans-unit.source: ARRAY_A – result will be output as an associative array.
ARRAY_N – result will be output as a numerically indexed array.
HTTP referer is a server variable. ‘referer’ is deliberately miss-spelled.
OBJECT – result will be output as an object.
WP_DEBUG must be true in addition to the filter evaluating to true.
trans-unit.target: WP_DEBUG 除了过滤器评估为true之外，WP_DEBUG还必须为true。

trans-unit.source: WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY and WP_DEBUG_LOG perform no function unless WP_DEBUG is true.
trans-unit.target: WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY 除非 WP_DEBUG 为true，否则WP_DEBUG_DISPLAY和 WP_DEBUG_LOG 不执行任何功能。

trans-unit.source: WP_Dependencies is a class defined in wp-includes/class.wp-dependencies.php that helps process items in an order defined by dependencies (a dependent item is processed later than a dependency). It’s an abstract class in that it’s intended to be extended, rather than used directly. WP_Dependencies is the base for WP_Scripts and WP_Styles, and is a collection of _WP_Dependencys.
WP_Styles handles both external and embedded stylesheets (though the latter must be associated with one of the former), outputting a <link> or <style> element as appropriate.

WP_Styles is a class that helps developers interact with a theme. It ensures registered stylesheets are output in the proper order, with dependent stylesheets coming after their dependencies. While more than one instance can be created, typically the global $wp_styles is used to enqueue stylesheets, which are then output by wp_print_styles during the
X-Pingback header is added conditionally after posts have been queried in handle_404().
trans-unit.target: X-Pingback 在handle_404（）中查询帖子后，将有条件地添加X-Pingback标头。

trans-unit.source: add_new – Default is ‘Add New’ for both hierarchical and non-hierarchical types. When internationalizing this string, please use a gettext context matching your post type. Example: _x( 'Add New', 'product', 'textdomain' );.
trans-unit.target: add_new –分层和非分层类型的默认值为“添加新”。国际化此字符串时，请使用与您的帖子类型匹配的gettext上下文。示例： _x( 'Add New', 'product', 'textdomain' ); 。

trans-unit.source: add_new – Default is ‘Add New’ for both hierarchical and non-hierarchical types. When internationalizing this string, please use a gettext context matching your post type. Example: _x( 'Add New', 'product', 'textdomain' );.
add_new_item – Label for adding a new singular item. Default is ‘Add New Post’ / ‘Add New Page’.
trans-unit.target: add_new_item –用于添加新单数的标签。默认值为“添加新帖子” /“添加新页面”。

trans-unit.source: admin_enqueue_scripts is the proper hook to use when enqueuing scripts and styles that are meant to be used in the administration panel. Despite the name, it is used for enqueuing both scripts and styles.
admin_print_scripts could be used to insert inline script in admin pages header while admin_print_footer_scripts could be used to insert inline script in admin pages footer.
admin_print_scripts mainly used to echo inline javascript in admin pages header.
admin_print_scriptsshould not be used to enqueue styles or scripts on the admin pages. Use admin_enqueue_scripts instead.
admin_print_styles should not be used to enqueue styles or scripts on the admin pages. Use admin_enqueue_scripts instead.
all_items – Label to signify all items in a submenu link. Default is ‘All Posts’ / ‘All Pages’.
trans-unit.target: all_items –标签以表示子菜单链接中的所有项目。默认值为“所有帖子” /“所有页面”。

trans-unit.source: archives – Label for archives in nav menus. Default is ‘Post Archives’ / ‘Page Archives’.
trans-unit.target: archives -导航菜单中的档案标签。默认值为“发布存档” /“页面存档”。

trans-unit.source: attributes – Label for the attributes meta box. Default is ‘Post Attributes’ / ‘Page Attributes’.
trans-unit.target: attributes –属性元框的标签。默认值为“发布属性” /“页面属性”。

trans-unit.source: auth: Authentication handler or array of user/password details to use for Basic authentication (Requests_Auth|array|boolean, default: false)
trans-unit.target: auth ：用于基本身份验证的身份验证处理程序或用户/密码详细信息数组（Requests_Auth | array | boolean，默认值：false）

trans-unit.source: blocking: Should we block processing on this request? (boolean, default: true)
trans-unit.target: blocking ：我们是否应该屏蔽此请求的处理？（布尔值，默认值：true）

trans-unit.source: bulk_edit_custom_box is an action that lets plugin print inputs for custom columns when bulk editing. This action is called one time for each custom column. Custom columns are added with the manage_edit-${post_type}_columns filter. To save the data from the custom inputs, hook the save_post action.

complete: A callback for when a request is complete. Takes two parameters, a Requests_Response/Requests_Exception reference, and the ID from the request array (Note: this can also be overridden on a per-request basis, although that’s a little silly) (callback)
trans-unit.target: complete ：请求完成时的回调。接受两个参数，一个Requests_Response / Requests_Exception引用，以及来自请求数组的ID（注意：尽管有些愚蠢，也可以基于每个请求覆盖此ID）（回调）

trans-unit.source: connect_timeout: How long should we wait while trying to connect? (float, seconds with a millisecond precision, default: 10, example: 0.01)
trans-unit.target: connect_timeout ：尝试连接时应等待多长时间？（浮点数，以毫秒为单位的秒精度，默认值：10，例如：0.01）

trans-unit.source: cookies: Associative array of cookie name to value, or cookie jar. (array|Requests_Cookie_Jar)
trans-unit.target: cookies ：cookie名称与值或cookie jar的关联数组。（数组| Requests_Cookie_Jar）

trans-unit.source: data: Associative array of data fields or a string. Same as the $data parameter to Requests::request (array|string, default: array())
trans-unit.target: data ：数据字段或字符串的关联数组。与Requests :: request的 $data 参数相同（array | string，默认值： array() ）

trans-unit.source: data_format: How should we send the $data parameter? (string, one of ‘query’ or ‘body’, default: ‘query’ for HEAD/GET/DELETE, ‘body’ for POST/PUT/OPTIONS/PATCH)
trans-unit.target: data_format ：如何发送 $data 参数？（字符串，“查询”或“正文”之一，默认值：“查询”用于HEAD / GET / DELETE，“正文”用于POST / PUT / OPTIONS / PATCH）

trans-unit.source: edit_item – Label for editing a singular item. Default is ‘Edit Post’ / ‘Edit Page’.
trans-unit.target: edit_item –用于编辑单个项目的标签。默认值为“编辑帖子” /“编辑页面”。

trans-unit.source: featured_image – Label for the Featured Image meta box title. Default is ‘Featured Image’.
trans-unit.target: featured_image -标签的特色图片元框标题。默认值为“精选图片”。

trans-unit.source: featured_image – Label for the featured image meta box title. Default is ‘Featured image’.
fetch_feed caches results for 12 hours by default. You can modify this by modifying the time interval via the filter wp_feed_cache_transient_lifetime.
filename: File to stream the body to instead. (string|boolean, default: false)
trans-unit.target: filename ：用于代替正文的文件。（字符串|布尔值，默认值：false）

trans-unit.source: filter_items_list – Label for the table views hidden heading. Default is ‘Filter posts list’ / ‘Filter pages list’.
trans-unit.target: filter_items_list –表视图隐藏标题的标签。默认值为“过滤器帖子列表” /“过滤器页面列表”。

trans-unit.source: follow_redirects: Should we follow 3xx redirects? (boolean, default: true)
trans-unit.target: follow_redirects ：我们应该遵循3xx重定向吗？（布尔值，默认值：true）

trans-unit.source: get_footer is a hook that gets run at the very start of the get_footer() function call. If you pass in the name for a specific footer file, like get_footer( 'new' ), the do_action will pass in the name as a parameter for the hook. This allows you to limit your add_action calls to specific templates if you wish. Actions added to this hook should be added to your functions.php file.

get_header is a hook that gets run at the very start of the get_header function call. If you pass in the name for a specific header file into the function get_header(), like get_header( 'new' ), the do_action will pass in the same name as a parameter for the hook. This allows you to limit your add_action calls to specific templates if you wish. Actions added to this hook should be added to your functions.php file.
get_option( 'page_for_posts' ): returns the ID of the static page assigned to the blog posts index (posts page)
trans-unit.target: get_option( 'page_for_posts' ) ：返回分配给博客文章索引的静态页面的 ID （文章页面）

trans-unit.source: get_option( 'page_on_front' ): returns the ID of the static page assigned to the front page
trans-unit.target: get_option( 'page_on_front' ) ：返回分配给首页的静态页面的 ID

trans-unit.source: headers: Associative array of header fields. Same as the $headers parameter to Requests::request (array, default: array())
trans-unit.target: headers ：标题字段的关联数组。与Requests :: request的 $headers 参数相同（数组，默认值： array() ）

trans-unit.source: insert_into_item – Label for the media frame button. Default is ‘Insert into post’ / ‘Insert into page’.
trans-unit.target: insert_into_item –媒体框按钮的标签。默认值为“插入帖子” /“插入页面”。

trans-unit.source: is_main_query() may be used with both front-end queries (theme templates, plugins, etc.), as well as admin queries. It will return true if the current query is the main query, and false if not.
trans-unit.target: is_main_query() 可以与前端查询（主题模板，插件等）以及管理查询一起使用。如果当前查询是主查询，它将返回 true ，否则返回 false 。

trans-unit.source: item_published – Label used when an item is published. Default is ‘Post published.’ / ‘Page published.’
trans-unit.target: item_published –发布项目时使用的标签。默认值为“发布后”。/“页面已发布。”

trans-unit.source: item_published_privately – Label used when an item is published with private visibility. Default is ‘Post published privately.’ / ‘Page published privately.’
trans-unit.target: item_published_privately –发布具有私人可见性的项目时使用的标签。默认值为“私下发布”。/“页面是私人发布的。”

trans-unit.source: item_reverted_to_draft – Label used when an item is switched to a draft. Default is ‘Post reverted to draft.’ / ‘Page reverted to draft.’
trans-unit.target: item_reverted_to_draft –将项目切换为草稿时使用的标签。默认值为“过帐恢复为草稿”。/“页面已还原为草稿。”

trans-unit.source: item_scheduled – Label used when an item is scheduled for publishing. Default is ‘Post scheduled.’ / ‘Page scheduled.’
trans-unit.target: item_scheduled –计划发布项目时使用的标签。默认值为“发布后预定”。/“预定页面。”

trans-unit.source: item_updated – Label used when an item is updated. Default is ‘Post updated.’ / ‘Page updated.’
trans-unit.target: item_updated –更新项目时使用的标签。默认值为“发布更新”。/“页面已更新。”

trans-unit.source: items_list – Label for the table hidden heading. Default is ‘Posts list’ / ‘Pages list’.
trans-unit.target: items_list –表隐藏标题的标签。默认值为“帖子列表” /“页面列表”。

trans-unit.source: items_list_navigation – Label for the table pagination hidden heading. Default is ‘Posts list navigation’ / ‘Pages list navigation’.
trans-unit.target: items_list_navigation –表分页隐藏标题的标签。默认值为“帖子列表导航” /“页面列表导航”。

trans-unit.source: login_enqueue_scripts is the proper hook to use when enqueuing items that are meant to appear on the login page. Despite the name, it is used for enqueuing both scripts and styles.
login_url is a filter applied to the url returned by the function wp_login_url()

manage_posts_columns is a filter applied to the columns shown on the manage posts screen. It’s applied to posts of all types except pages. To add a custom column for pages, hook the manage_pages_columns filter. To add a custom column for specific custom post types, hook the manage_{$post_type}_posts_columns filter.
max_bytes: Limit for the response body size. (integer|boolean, default: false)
trans-unit.target: max_bytes ：响应正文大小的限制。（整数|布尔值，默认值：false）

trans-unit.source: menu_name – Label for the menu name. Default is the same as name.
trans-unit.target: menu_name –菜单名称的标签。默认值与 name 相同。

trans-unit.source: meta_query also contains one or more arrays with the following keys:
trans-unit.target: meta_query 还包含一个或多个具有以下键的数组：

trans-unit.source: name – General name for the post type, usually plural. The same and overridden by $post_type_object->label. Default is ‘Posts’ / ‘Pages’.
trans-unit.target: name -帖子类型的通用名称，通常为复数形式。相同，并由 $post_type_object->label 覆盖。默认值为“帖子” /“页面”。

trans-unit.source: new_item – Label for the new item page title. Default is ‘New Post’ / ‘New Page’.
trans-unit.target: new_item –新项目页面标题的标签。默认值为“新帖子” /“新页面”。

trans-unit.source: not_found – Label used when no items are found. Default is ‘No posts found’ / ‘No pages found’.
trans-unit.target: not_found –未找到任何项目时使用的标签。默认值为“未找到帖子” /“未找到页面”。

trans-unit.source: not_found_in_trash – Label used when no items are in the Trash. Default is ‘No posts found in Trash’ / ‘No pages found in Trash’.
not_found_in_trash – Label used when no items are in the trash. Default is ‘No posts found in Trash’ / ‘No pages found in Trash’.
trans-unit.target: not_found_in_trash –垃圾桶中没有任何物品时使用的标签。默认值为“在垃圾箱中未找到帖子” /“在垃圾箱中未找到页面”。

trans-unit.source: parent_item_colon – Label used to prefix parents of hierarchical items. Not used on non-hierarchical post types. Default is ‘Parent Page:’.
trans-unit.target: parent_item_colon –用于为分层项的父项添加前缀的标签。不适用于非分层帖子类型。默认值为“父页面：”。

trans-unit.source: post_link is a filter applied to the permalink URL for a post prior to returning the processed url by the function get_permalink().
post_type_link is a filter applied to the permalink URL for a post or custom post type prior to being returned by the function get_post_permalink() .
pre_get_posts runs beforeWP_Query has been set up. Some template tags and conditional functions that rely on WP_Query will not work. For example, is_front_page() will not work, although is_home()
proxy: Proxy details to use for proxy by-passing and authentication (Requests_Proxy|array|string|boolean, default: false)
trans-unit.target: proxy ：用于代理绕过和身份验证的代理详细信息（Requests_Proxy | array | string | boolean，默认值：false）

trans-unit.source: query_posts() will change your main query and is not recommended. Only use if absolutely necessary. Creating a new instance of WP_Query or get_posts() is preferred for secondary loops. If you would like to modify the main query, use the pre_get_posts action.
trans-unit.target: query_posts() 将更改您的主要查询，不建议使用。仅在绝对必要时使用。对于辅助循环，最好创建 WP_Query 或 get_posts() 的新实例。如果要修改主查询，请使用 pre_get_posts 操作。

trans-unit.source: redirects: How many times should we redirect before erroring? (integer, default: 10)
trans-unit.target: redirects ：错误之前，我们应该重定向多少次？（整数，默认值：10）

trans-unit.source: remove_featured_image – Label for removing the featured image. Default is ‘Remove featured image’.
trans-unit.target: remove_featured_image –用于删除特色图像的标签。默认值为“删除特色图片”。

trans-unit.source: restore_current_blog() should be called after every switch_to_blog(). If not, a global variable which monitors the switching, $GLOBALS['_wp_switched_stack'], will not be empty even if you use switch_to_blog() to return to the original blog. If $GLOBALS['_wp_switched_stack'] is not empty, WP will think it is in a switched state and can potentially return the wrong URL for the site via wp_upload_dir(). See http://wordpress.stackexchange.com/a/123516/27757

save_post is an action triggered whenever a post or page is created or updated, which could be from an import, post/page edit form, xmlrpc, or post by email. The data for the post is stored in $_POST, $_GET or the global $post_data, depending on how the post was edited. For example, quick edits use $_POST.
search_items – Label for searching plural items. Default is ‘Search Posts’ / ‘Search Pages’.
trans-unit.target: search_items –用于搜索多个项目的标签。默认值为“搜索帖子” /“搜索页面”。

trans-unit.source: set_featured_image – Label for setting the featured image. Default is ‘Set featured image’.
trans-unit.target: set_featured_image –用于设置特色图像的标签。默认值为“设置特色图片”。

trans-unit.source: setup_postdata() does not assign the global $post variable so it’s important that you do this yourself. Failure to do so will cause problems with any hooks that use any of the above globals in conjunction with the $post global, as they will refer to separate entities.
single-{post_type}-{post_name}.php was added to the top of the template hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: single-{post_type}-{post_name}.php 已添加到模板层次结构的顶部。

trans-unit.source: singular_name – Name for one object of this post type. Default is ‘Post’ / ‘Page’.
trans-unit.target: singular_name –此帖子类型的一个对象的名称。默认值为“发布” /“页面”。

trans-unit.source: the_permalink is a filter applied to the permalink URL for a post prior to printing by the function the_permalink().

the_title is a filter applied to the post title retrieved from the database, prior to printing on the screen. In some cases (such as when the_title is used), the title can be suppressed by returning a false value (e.g. NULL, FALSE or the empty string) from the filter function.

timeout: How long should we wait for a response? Note: for cURL, a minimum of 1 second applies, as DNS resolution operates at second-resolution only. (float, seconds with a millisecond precision, default: 10, example: 0.01)
trans-unit.target: timeout ：我们应该等待多长时间？注意：对于cURL，至少需要1秒，因为DNS解析仅以第二解析度运行。（浮点数，以毫秒为单位的秒精度，默认值：10，例如：0.01）

trans-unit.source: transport: Custom transport. Either a class name, or a transport object. Defaults to the first working transport from getTransport() (string|Requests_Transport, default: getTransport())
trans-unit.target: transport ：海关运输。类名或传输对象。默认为getTransport（）中的第一个有效传输（string | Requests_Transport，默认为：getTransport（））

trans-unit.source: type: HTTP request type (use Requests constants). Same as the $type parameter to Requests::request (string, default: Requests::GET)
trans-unit.target: type ：HTTP请求类型（使用请求常量）。与Requests :: request的 $type 参数相同（字符串，默认值： Requests::GET ）

trans-unit.source: uploaded_to_this_item – Label for the media frame filter. Default is ‘Uploaded to this post’ / ‘Uploaded to this page’.
trans-unit.target: uploaded_to_this_item –媒体框架过滤器的标签。默认值为“上传到此帖子” /“上传到此页面”。

trans-unit.source: url: Request URL Same as the $url parameter to Requests::request (string, required)
trans-unit.target: url ：请求URL与Requests :: request的 $url 参数相同（字符串，必填）

trans-unit.source: use_featured_image – Label in the media frame for using a featured image. Default is ‘Use as featured image’.
trans-unit.target: use_featured_image –媒体框架中的标签，用于使用特色图像。默认值为“用作特色图片”。

trans-unit.source: useragent: Useragent to send to the server (string, default: php-requests/$version)
trans-unit.target: useragent ：要发送到服务器的Useragent（字符串，默认值：php-requests / $ version）

trans-unit.source: verify: Should we verify SSL certificates? Allows passing in a custom certificate file as a string. (Using true uses the system-wide root certificate store instead, but this may have different behaviour across transports.) (string|boolean, default: library/Requests/Transport/cacert.pem)
trans-unit.target: verify ：我们应该验证SSL证书吗？允许将自定义证书文件作为字符串传递。（使用true会改为使用系统范围的根证书存储，但这在传输中可能会有不同的行为。）（字符串|布尔值，默认值：library / Requests / Transport / cacert.pem）

trans-unit.source: verifyname: Should we verify the common name in the SSL certificate? (boolean: default, true)
trans-unit.target: verifyname ：我们是否应该验证SSL证书中的通用名称？（布尔值：默认，true）

trans-unit.source: view_item – Label for viewing a singular item. Default is ‘View Post’ / ‘View Page’.
trans-unit.target: view_item –用于查看单个项目的标签。默认值为“查看帖子” /“查看页面”。

trans-unit.source: view_items – Label for viewing post type archives. Default is ‘View Posts’ / ‘View Pages’.
trans-unit.target: view_items –用于查看帖子类型档案的标签。默认值为“查看帖子” /“查看页面”。

trans-unit.source: wp_enqueue_scripts is the proper hook to use when enqueuing scripts and styles that are meant to appear on the front end. Despite the name, it is used for enqueuing both scripts and styles.

wp_filter_kses should generally be preferred over wp_kses_data because wp_magic_quotes escapes $_GET, $_POST, $_COOKIE, $_SERVER, and $_REQUEST fairly early in the hook system, shortly after ‘plugins_loaded’ but earlier then ‘init’ or ‘wp_loaded’.
wpmu_new_blog is an action triggered whenever a new blog is created within a multisite network.
{Post Type Template}.php was added to the top of the template hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: {Post Type Template}.php 已添加到模板层次结构的顶部。

trans-unit.source: (array) A named array of WHERE clauses (in column => value pairs). Multiple clauses will be joined with ANDs. Both $where columns and $where values should be “raw”.
(array) Data to insert (in column => value pairs). Both $data columns and $data values should be “raw” (neither should be SQL escaped).
(array) Data to replace (in column => value pairs). Both $data columns and $data values should be “raw” (neither should be SQL escaped).

(array) Data to update (in column => value pairs). Both $data columns and $data values should be “raw” (neither should be SQL escaped). This means that if you are using GET or POST data you may need to use stripslashes() to avoid slashes ending up in the database.

(array|string)(optional) An array of formats to be mapped to each of the value in $data. If string, that format will be used for all of the values in $data. If omitted, all values in $data will be treated as strings unless otherwise specified in wpdb::$field_types. Possible format values: %s as string; %d as integer (whole number); and %f as float. (See below for more information.)
(array|string)(optional) An array of formats to be mapped to each of the values in $data. If string, that format will be used for all of the values in $data.

(array|string)(optional) An array of formats to be mapped to each of the values in $data. If string, that format will be used for all of the values in $data. If omitted, all values in $data will be treated as strings unless otherwise specified in wpdb::$field_types.

(array|string)(optional) An array of formats to be mapped to each of the values in $where. If string, that format will be used for all of the items in $where. Possible format values: %s as string; %d as integer (whole number) and %f as float. (See below for more information.) If omitted, all values in $where will be treated as strings.
(integer) The desired column (0 being the first). Defaults to 0.
(integer) The desired row (0 being the first). Defaults to 0.

(int|string|array) The value to substitute into the placeholder. Many values may be passed by simply passing more arguments in a sprintf()-like fashion. Alternatively the second argument can be an array containing the values as in PHP’s vsprintf() function. Care must be taken not to allow direct user input to this parameter, which would enable array manipulation of any query with multiple placeholders.Note: Values cannot be SQL-escaped.
(string) The SQL query you wish to execute, with placeholders (see below).
(string) The SQL query you wish to execute.
(string) The name of the table to insert data into.
(string) The name of the table to replace data in.
(string) The name of the table to update.
(string) The query you wish to run.
(string) The query you wish to run. Setting this parameter to null will return the specified variable from the cached results of the previous query.
(string) the query you wish to execute. Setting this parameter to null will return the specified column from the cached results of the previous query.
By using the ‘meta_value’ parameter the value 99 will be considered greater than 100 as the data are stored as ‘strings’, not ‘numbers’. For number comparison use ‘meta_value_num’.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用“ meta_value”参数，由于数据存储为“字符串”而不是“数字”，因此值99将被视为大于100。对于数字比较，请使用“ meta_value_num”。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can extract the folder name with the following line:
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以使用以下行提取文件夹名称：

trans-unit.source: Note: If called with the id or name parameter, the constructor queries the (wp_)users table. If successful, the additional row data become properties of the object: user_login, user_pass, user_nicename, user_email, user_url, user_registered, user_activation_key, user_status, display_name, spam(multisite only), deleted(multisite only).
This adds a new setting to the database.

quick_edit_custom_box is an action that lets a plugin print inputs for custom columns when quick editing. This action is called one time for each custom column. Custom columns are added with the manage_{$post_type}_posts_columns filter. To save the data from the custom inputs, hook the save_post action.

trans-unit.target: 使用$ headers设置“发件人：”，“抄送：”和“密件抄送：”参数

trans-unit.source: Display posts from the current page and set the ‘paged’ parameter to 1 when the query variable is not set (first page).
trans-unit.target: 显示当前页面上的帖子，并在未设置查询变量（第一页）时将“ paged”参数设置为1。
具有“ meta_value”和自定义帖子类型的“ orderby”

trans-unit.source: register_new_user() doesn’t handle the user creation itself, it simply checks the submitted username and email validity and generates a random password, relying on wp_create_user() to create the new User. If registration worked it sends a notification email to the user with his password using wp_new_user_notification(). In case of registration failure it returns a WP_Error().
'id=>parent' – Return an array of stdClass objects with ID and post_parent properties.
trans-unit.target: 'id=>parent' parent'–返回具有ID和post_parent属性的stdClass对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: 'ids' – Return an array of post IDs.
ARRAY_A – result will be output as a numerically indexed array of associative arrays, using column names as keys.
ARRAY_N – result will be output as a numerically indexed array of numerically indexed arrays.
OBJECT – result will be output as a numerically indexed array of row objects.
OBJECT_K – result will be output as an associative array of row objects, using first column’s values as keys (duplicates will be discarded).
after (string/array) – Date to retrieve posts after. Accepts strtotime()-compatible string, or array of ‘year’, ‘month’, ‘day’ values:
trans-unit.target: after （ string / array）–之后检索帖子的日期。接受 strtotime() 兼容的字符串，或'year'，'month'，'day'值的数组：
author__in （数组）–使用作者ID（自3.7版开始可用）。
author__not_in （数组）–使用作者ID（自3.7版开始可用）。

trans-unit.source: before (string/array) – Date to retrieve posts before. Accepts strtotime()-compatible string, or array of ‘year’, ‘month’, ‘day’ values:
trans-unit.target: before （字符串/数组）–之前检索帖子的日期。接受 strtotime() 兼容的字符串，或'year'，'month'，'day'值的数组：

trans-unit.source: column (string) – Posts column to query against. Default: ‘post_date’.
trans-unit.target: column （ string）–发布要查询的列。默认值：“ post_date”。

trans-unit.source: comment_count (Array) – If comment_count is an array, it should have two arguments:
trans-unit.target: comment_count （ Array）–如果comment_count是一个数组，则应具有两个参数：

trans-unit.source: comment_count (int) – The amount of comments your CPT has to have ( Search operator will do a ‘=’ operation )
trans-unit.target: comment_count （ int）–您的CPT必须具有的评论数（搜索运算符将执行'='操作）

trans-unit.source: compare (string) – Operator to test. Possible values are ‘=’, ‘!=’, ‘>’, ‘>=’, ‘<‘, ‘<=’, ‘LIKE’, ‘NOT LIKE’, ‘IN’, ‘NOT IN’, ‘BETWEEN’, ‘NOT BETWEEN’, ‘EXISTS’ and ‘NOT EXISTS’. Default value is ‘=’.
trans-unit.target: compare （ string）–要测试的运算符。可能的值为'='，'！='，'>'，'> ='，'<'，'<='，'LIKE'，'NOT LIKE'，'IN'，'NOT IN'，'BETWEEN ”，“不存在”，“存在”和“不存在”。默认值为“ =”。
date_query （ array）–日期参数（自3.7版开始可用）。

trans-unit.source: day (string) The day of the month. Accepts numbers 1-31. Default: 1.
trans-unit.target: day （字符串）月份中的一天。接受数字1-31。默认值：1。

trans-unit.source: day (string) The day of the month. Accepts numbers 1-31. Default: last day of month.
trans-unit.target: day （字符串）月份中的一天。接受数字1-31。默认值：每月的最后一天。

trans-unit.source: field (string) – Select taxonomy term by. Possible values are ‘term_id’, ‘name’, ‘slug’ or ‘term_taxonomy_id’. Default value is ‘term_id’.
trans-unit.target: field （字符串）–选择分类法依据。可能的值为“ term_id”，“ name”，“ slug”或“ term_taxonomy_id”。默认值为“ term_id”。

trans-unit.source: fields (string) – Which fields to return. There are three options:
trans-unit.target: fields （字符串）–要返回的字段。共有三个选项：

trans-unit.source: has_password (bool) – true for posts with passwords ; false for posts without passwords ; null for all posts with and without passwords (available since version 3.9).
trans-unit.target: has_password （ bool）–对于带有密码的帖子，为true；对于没有密码的帖子为false; 对于所有带密码和不带密码的帖子都为null（自3.9版开始可用）。

trans-unit.source: ignore_sticky_posts (boolean) – ignore post stickiness (available since version 3.1, replaced caller_get_posts parameter). false (default): move sticky posts to the start of the set. true: do not move sticky posts to the start of the set.
trans-unit.target: ignore_sticky_posts （ boolean）–忽略帖子的粘性（自版本3.1起可用，已替换 caller_get_posts 参数）。 false （默认）：将即时贴移至集合的开头。 true ：不要将粘性帖子移动到集合的开头。

trans-unit.source: include_children (boolean) – Whether or not to include children for hierarchical taxonomies. Defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: include_children （ boolean）–是否包括子级分类法。默认为true。

trans-unit.source: inclusive (boolean) – For after/before, whether exact value should be matched or not’.
trans-unit.target: inclusive （布尔）-对于之后/之前，是否应该匹配精确值'。

trans-unit.source: meta_compare (string) – Operator to test the ‘meta_value‘. Possible values are ‘=’, ‘!=’, ‘>’, ‘>=’, ‘<‘, ‘<=’, ‘LIKE’, ‘NOT LIKE’, ‘IN’, ‘NOT IN’, ‘BETWEEN’, ‘NOT BETWEEN’, ‘NOT EXISTS’, ‘REGEXP’, ‘NOT REGEXP’ or ‘RLIKE’. Default value is ‘=’.
trans-unit.target: meta_compare （字符串）–用于测试“ meta_value ”的运算符。可能的值为'='，'！='，'>'，'> ='，'<'，'<='，'LIKE'，'NOT LIKE'，'IN'，'NOT IN'，'BETWEEN ”，“不存在”，“不存在”，“ REGEXP”，“不REGEXP”或“ RLIKE”。默认值为“ =”。
meta_query （ array）–自定义字段参数（自版本3.1起可用）。

trans-unit.source: month (string) The month of the year. Accepts numbers 1-12. Default: 1.
trans-unit.target: month （字符串）一年中的月份。接受数字1-12。默认值：1。

trans-unit.source: month (string) The month of the year. Accepts numbers 1-12. Default: 12.
trans-unit.target: month （字符串）一年中的月份。接受数字1-12。默认值：12

trans-unit.source: nopaging (boolean) – show all posts or use pagination. Default value is ‘false’, use paging.
trans-unit.target: nopaging （ boolean）–显示所有帖子或使用分页。默认值为“ false”，使用分页。

trans-unit.source: offset (int) – number of post to displace or pass over. Warning: Setting the offset parameter overrides/ignores the paged parameter and breaks pagination. The 'offset' parameter is ignored when 'posts_per_page'=>-1 (show all posts) is used.
trans-unit.target: offset （ int）–要置换或越过的职位数。警告：设置偏移量参数会覆盖/忽略分页的参数并中断分页。使用 'offset' 'posts_per_page'=>-1 （显示所有帖子）时，将忽略 “ offset”参数。

trans-unit.source: operator (string) – Operator to test. Possible values are ‘IN’, ‘NOT IN’, ‘AND’, ‘EXISTS’ and ‘NOT EXISTS’. Default value is ‘IN’.
trans-unit.target: operator （ string）–要测试的运算符。可能的值为“ IN”，“ NOT IN”，“ AND”，“ EXISTS”和“ NOT EXISTS”。默认值为“ IN”。

trans-unit.source: order (string | array) – Designates the ascending or descending order of the ‘orderby‘ parameter. Defaults to ‘DESC’. An array can be used for multiple order/orderby sets.
trans-unit.target: order （字符串|数组）–指定' orderby '参数的升序或降序。默认为“ DESC”。数组可用于多个order / orderby集。

trans-unit.source: orderby (string | array) – Sort retrieved posts by parameter. Defaults to ‘date (post_date)’. One or more options can be passed.
trans-unit.target: orderby （字符串|数组）–按参数对检索到的帖子进行排序。默认为'date（post_date）'。可以传递一个或多个选项。

trans-unit.source: page (int) – number of page for a static front page. Show the posts that would normally show up just on page X of a Static Front Page.
trans-unit.target: page （ int）–静态首页的页数。显示通常仅在静态首页的第X页上显示的帖子。

trans-unit.source: paged (int) – number of page. Show the posts that would normally show up just on page X when using the “Older Entries” link.
trans-unit.target: paged （ int）–页数。使用“较早的条目”链接时，显示通常仅在X页上显示的帖子。

trans-unit.source: post__in (array) – use post ids. Specify posts to retrieve. ATTENTION If you use sticky posts, they will be included (prepended!) in the posts you retrieve whether you want it or not. To suppress this behaviour use ignore_sticky_posts.
trans-unit.target: post__in （数组）–使用帖子ID。指定要检索的帖子。注意如果您使用粘性帖子，则无论您是否想要，它们都将包含（添加！）在您检索的帖子中。要抑制此行为，请使用 ignore_sticky_posts 。

trans-unit.source: post__not_in (array) – use post ids. Specify post NOT to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: post__not_in （数组）–使用帖子ID。指定不检索的帖子。

trans-unit.source: post_name__in (array) – use post slugs. Specify posts to retrieve. (Will be available in version 4.4)
trans-unit.target: post_name__in （数组）–使用后post。指定要检索的帖子。（将在版本4.4中提供）

trans-unit.source: post_parent (int) – use page id to return only child pages. Set to 0 to return only top-level entries.
trans-unit.target: post_parent （ int）–使用页面ID仅返回子页面。设置为0仅返回顶级条目。

trans-unit.source: post_parent__in (array) – use post ids. Specify posts whose parent is in an array. (available since version 3.6)
trans-unit.target: post_parent__in （数组）–使用帖子ID。指定其父级位于数组中的帖子。（自3.6版开始可用）

trans-unit.source: post_parent__not_in (array) – use post ids. Specify posts whose parent is not in an array. (available since version 3.6)
trans-unit.target: post_parent__not_in （数组）–使用帖子ID。指定其父级不在数组中的帖子。（自3.6版开始可用）

trans-unit.source: post_password (string) – show posts with a particular password (available since version 3.9)
trans-unit.target: post_password （字符串）–显示具有特定密码的帖子（自3.9版开始可用）

trans-unit.source: post_status (string / array) – use post status. Retrieves posts by post status. Default value is ‘publish‘, but if the user is logged in, ‘private‘ is added. Public custom post statuses are also included by default. And if the query is run in an admin context (administration area or AJAX call), protected statuses are added too. By default protected statuses are ‘future‘, ‘draft‘ and ‘pending‘.
trans-unit.target: post_status （字符串 /数组）–使用发布状态。按帖子状态检索帖子。默认值为“ publish ”，但如果用户登录，则添加“ private ”。默认情况下，还包括公共自定义帖子状态。而且，如果查询是在管理上下文（管理区域或AJAX调用）中运行的，那么也会添加受保护的状态。默认情况下，受保护状态为“ future ”，“ draft ”和“ pending ”。

trans-unit.source: post_type (string / array) – use post types. Retrieves posts by post types, default value is ‘post‘. If ‘tax_query‘ is set for a query, the default value becomes ‘any‘;
trans-unit.target: post_type （字符串 /数组）–使用帖子类型。按帖子类型检索帖子，默认值为“ post ”。如果为查询设置了“ tax_query ”，则默认值为“ any ”；

trans-unit.source: posts_per_archive_page (int) – number of posts to show per page – on archive pages only. Over-rides posts_per_page and showposts on pages where is_archive() or is_search() would be true.
trans-unit.target: posts_per_archive_page （ int）–仅在存档页面上每页显示的帖子数。过乘坐 posts_per_page 和 showposts 的网页的 is_archive（）或 is_search（）是正确的。

trans-unit.source: posts_per_page (int) – number of post to show per page (available since version 2.1, replaced showposts parameter). Use 'posts_per_page'=>-1 to show all posts (the 'offset' parameter is ignored with a -1 value). Set the ‘paged’ parameter if pagination is off after using this parameter. Note: if the query is in a feed, wordpress overwrites this parameter with the stored ‘posts_per_rss’ option. To reimpose the limit, try using the ‘post_limits’ filter, or filter ‘pre_option_posts_per_rss’ and return -1
trans-unit.target: posts_per_page （ int）–每页显示的帖子数（自2.1版开始可用，已替换 showposts 参数）。使用 'posts_per_page'=>-1 显示所有帖子（ 'offset' 参数被忽略，值为 -1 ）。如果使用此参数后分页关闭，则设置“分页”参数。注意：如果查询在供稿中，则wordpress会使用存储的“ posts_per_rss”选项覆盖此参数。要重新设置限制，请尝试使用“ post_limits”过滤器，或过滤“ pre_option_posts_per_rss”并返回-1

trans-unit.source: relation (string) – OR or AND, how the sub-arrays should be compared. Default: AND.
trans-unit.target: relation （字符串）– OR或AND，应该如何比较子数组。默认值：AND。

trans-unit.source: relation (string) – The logical relationship between each inner meta_query array when there is more than one. Possible values are ‘AND’, ‘OR’. Do not use with a single inner meta_query array.
trans-unit.target: relation （字符串）–每个内部meta_query数组之间存在多个逻辑关系时的逻辑关系。可能的值为“ AND”，“ OR”。不要与单个内部meta_query数组一起使用。

trans-unit.source: relation (string) – The logical relationship between each inner taxonomy array when there is more than one. Possible values are ‘AND’, ‘OR’. Do not use with a single inner taxonomy array.
trans-unit.target: relation （字符串）–每个内部分类法数组之间存在多个逻辑分类关系时的逻辑关系。可能的值为“ AND”，“ OR”。不要与单个内部分类法数组一起使用。
tax_query （ array）–使用分类参数（自版本3.1起可用）。

trans-unit.source: type (string) – Custom field type. Possible values are ‘NUMERIC’, ‘BINARY’, ‘CHAR’, ‘DATE’, ‘DATETIME’, ‘DECIMAL’, ‘SIGNED’, ‘TIME’, ‘UNSIGNED’. Default value is ‘CHAR’.
trans-unit.target: type （ string）–自定义字段类型。可能的值为“ NUMERIC”，“ BINARY”，“ CHAR”，“ DATE”，“ DATETIME”，“ DECIMAL”，“ SIGNED”，“ TIME”，“ UNSIGNED”。默认值为“ CHAR”。

trans-unit.source: value (string|array) – Custom field value. It can be an array only when compare is 'IN', 'NOT IN', 'BETWEEN', or 'NOT BETWEEN'. You don’t have to specify a value when using the 'EXISTS' or 'NOT EXISTS' comparisons in WordPress 3.9 and up.
trans-unit.target: value （字符串 |数组）–自定义字段值。仅当 compare 为 'IN' ， 'NOT IN' ， 'BETWEEN' 或 'NOT BETWEEN' 时，它才可以是数组。在WordPress 3.9及更高版本中使用 'EXISTS' 或 'NOT EXISTS' 比较时，无需指定值。

trans-unit.source: w (int) – Week of the year (from 0 to 53). Uses MySQL WEEK command. The mode is dependent on the “start_of_week” option.
trans-unit.target: w （ int）–一年中的星期（从0到53）。使用 MySQL WEEK命令。该模式取决于“ start_of_week”选项。

trans-unit.source: year (string) Accepts any four-digit year. Default is empty.
trans-unit.target: year （字符串）接受任何四位数的年份。默认为空。

trans-unit.source: {tax} (string) – use taxonomy slug. (Deprecated since version 3.1 in favor of ‘tax_query‘).
trans-unit.target: {tax} （字符串）–使用分类标准。（不推荐使用，因为赞成“的3.1版本 tax_query ”）。

trans-unit.source: Attention:%d can’t deal with comma values – if you’re not using full numbers, use string/%s.
